description: Values of Newton-Gregory forward interpolating polynomial (1/3)*(n-1)*(2*n+3)*(2*n-1).
comments: Starting at a(2)=7, a(n) = the partial sums of A073577. - _J. M. Bergot_, Apr 20 2016
references: S. Falcon, Relationships between Some k-Fibonacci Sequences, Applied Mathematics, 2014, 5, 2226-2234; http://www.scirp.org/journal/am; http://dx.doi.org/10.4236/am.2014.515216
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-6,4,-1).
